Package Weapons

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Weapons.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knife, Shotgun, Sniper, Submachine
public abstract class Weapon extends Object
This class represents a Weapon. It can perform various actions such as shooting and reloading
Version:
5/20
Author:
Julian

  • Constructor Details

    • Weapon

      public Weapon​(int mag, double reloadTime, double sight, double movement, double dmg, double maxDistance)
      Weapon constructor, creates a weapon object
      Parameters:
      mag - Magazine size of weapon
      reloadTime - Reload time of weapon
      sight - Sight of the Player when holding the weapon
      movement - Movement of the weapon

  • Method Details

    • shoot

      public abstract ArrayList<Bullet> shoot​(int x, int y, Player p)
      Shoots the weapon, and returns the bullets that were shot
      Parameters:
      x - Beginning X location
      y - Beginning Y location
      p - Player that the weapon belongs to
